!Alex: Welcome, my friend. If Master Luther sent you here you must be ready to get to work. Floran Village needs more good workers like you. We don't have a guard or even a single skilled person! I have been waiting for you since I received the warrant of appointment. Take this and give it to my adjutant *Militia Leirynn*... She is a modest lady. I am afraid that work here may not be as easy as you think... I thank you in advance. [Quest _225_TestOfTheSearcher 30291-01t.htm|Ask about the Floran Militia]
